00002 #ifndef _XMLRPCVALUE_H_
00003 #define _XMLRPCVALUE_H_

00010 #endif

00012 #ifndef MAKEDEPEND
00013 # include <map>
00014 # include <string>
00015 # include <vector>
00016 # include <time.h>
00017 #endif
00018 
00019 namespace XmlRpc {
00020 
00025   //   should probably refcount them...
00026   class XmlRpcValue {
00027   public:
00028 
00030     enum Type {
00031       TypeInvalid,
00032       TypeBoolean,
00033       TypeInt,
00034       TypeDouble,
00035       TypeString,
00036       TypeDateTime,
00037       TypeBase64,
00038       TypeArray,
00039       TypeStruct
00040     };
00041 
00042     // Non-primitive types
00043     typedef std::vector<char> BinaryData;
00044     typedef std::vector<XmlRpcValue> ValueArray;
00045     typedef std::map<std::string, XmlRpcValue> ValueStruct;
00046 
00047 
00048     // Constructors
00050     XmlRpcValue() : _type(TypeInvalid) { _value.asBinary = 0; }
00051 
00053     XmlRpcValue(bool value) : _type(TypeBoolean) { _value.asBool = value; }
00054 
00056     XmlRpcValue(int value)  : _type(TypeInt) { _value.asInt = value; }
00057 
00059     XmlRpcValue(double value)  : _type(TypeDouble) { _value.asDouble = value; }
00060 
00062     XmlRpcValue(std::string const& value) : _type(TypeString) 
00063     { _value.asString = new std::string(value); }
00064 
00067     XmlRpcValue(const char* value)  : _type(TypeString)
00068     { _value.asString = new std::string(value); }
00069 
00072     XmlRpcValue(struct tm* value)  : _type(TypeDateTime) 
00073     { _value.asTime = new struct tm(*value); }
00074 
00078     XmlRpcValue(void* value, int nBytes)  : _type(TypeBase64)
00079     {
00080       _value.asBinary = new BinaryData((char*)value, ((char*)value)+nBytes);
00081     }
00082 
00084     XmlRpcValue(std::string const& xml, int* offset) : _type(TypeInvalid)
00085     { if ( ! fromXml(xml,offset)) _type = TypeInvalid; }
00086 
00088     XmlRpcValue(XmlRpcValue const& rhs) : _type(TypeInvalid) { *this = rhs; }
00089 
00091     /*virtual*/ ~XmlRpcValue() { invalidate(); }
00092 
00094     void clear() { invalidate(); }
00095 
00096     // Operators
00099     XmlRpcValue& operator=(XmlRpcValue const& rhs);
00100 
00102     XmlRpcValue& operator=(int const& rhs) { return operator=(XmlRpcValue(rhs)); }
00103 
00105     XmlRpcValue& operator=(double const& rhs) { return operator=(XmlRpcValue(rhs)); }
00106 
00108     XmlRpcValue& operator=(const char* rhs) { return operator=(XmlRpcValue(std::string(rhs))); }
00109 
00111     bool operator==(XmlRpcValue const& other) const;
00112 
00114     bool operator!=(XmlRpcValue const& other) const;
00115 
00119     operator bool&()          { assertTypeOrInvalid(TypeBoolean); return _value.asBool; }
00120 
00124     operator int&()           { assertTypeOrInvalid(TypeInt); return _value.asInt; }
00125 
00129     operator double&()        { assertTypeOrInvalid(TypeDouble); return _value.asDouble; }
00130 
00134     operator std::string&()   { assertTypeOrInvalid(TypeString); return *_value.asString; }
00135 
00139     operator BinaryData&()    { assertTypeOrInvalid(TypeBase64); return *_value.asBinary; }
00140 
00144     operator struct tm&()     { assertTypeOrInvalid(TypeDateTime); return *_value.asTime; }
00145 
00146 
00151     XmlRpcValue const& operator[](int i) const { assertArray(i+1); return _value.asArray->at(i); }
00152 
00156     XmlRpcValue& operator[](int i)             { assertArray(i+1); return _value.asArray->at(i); }
00157 
00160     XmlRpcValue& operator[](std::string const& k) { assertStruct(); return (*_value.asStruct)[k]; }
00161 
00164     XmlRpcValue& operator[](const char* k) { assertStruct(); std::string s(k); return (*_value.asStruct)[s]; }
00165 
00168     operator ValueStruct const&() { assertStruct(); return *_value.asStruct; } 
00169 
00170     // Accessors
00172     bool valid() const { return _type != TypeInvalid; }
00173 
00175     Type const &getType() const { return _type; }
00176 
00178     int size() const;
00179 
00181     void setSize(int size)    { assertArray(size); }
00182 
00184     bool hasMember(const std::string& name) const;
00185 
00187     bool fromXml(std::string const& valueXml, int* offset);
00188 
00190     std::string toXml() const;
00191 
00193     std::ostream& write(std::ostream& os) const;
00194 
00195     // Formatting
00197     static std::string const& getDoubleFormat() { return _doubleFormat; }
00198 
00200     static void setDoubleFormat(const char* f) { _doubleFormat = f; }
00201 
00202 
00203   protected:
00204     // Clean up
00205     void invalidate();
00206 
00207     // Type checking
00208     void assertTypeOrInvalid(Type t);
00209     void assertArray(int size) const;
00210     void assertArray(int size);
00211     void assertStruct();
00212 
00213     // XML decoding
00214     bool boolFromXml(std::string const& valueXml, int* offset);
00215     bool intFromXml(std::string const& valueXml, int* offset);
00216     bool doubleFromXml(std::string const& valueXml, int* offset);
00217     bool stringFromXml(std::string const& valueXml, int* offset);
00218     bool timeFromXml(std::string const& valueXml, int* offset);
00219     bool binaryFromXml(std::string const& valueXml, int* offset);
00220     bool arrayFromXml(std::string const& valueXml, int* offset);
00221     bool structFromXml(std::string const& valueXml, int* offset);
00222 
00223     // XML encoding
00224     std::string boolToXml() const;
00225     std::string intToXml() const;
00226     std::string doubleToXml() const;
00227     std::string stringToXml() const;
00228     std::string timeToXml() const;
00229     std::string binaryToXml() const;
00230     std::string arrayToXml() const;
00231     std::string structToXml() const;
00232 
00233     // Format strings
00234     static std::string _doubleFormat;
00235 
00236     // Type tag and values
00237     Type _type;
00238 
00239     // At some point I will split off Arrays and Structs into
00240     // separate ref-counted objects for more efficient copying.
00241     union {
00242       bool          asBool;
00243       int           asInt;
00244       double        asDouble;
00245       struct tm*    asTime;
00246       std::string*  asString;
00247       BinaryData*   asBinary;
00248       ValueArray*   asArray;
00249       ValueStruct*  asStruct;
00250     } _value;
00251     
00252   };
00253 } // namespace XmlRpc

00256 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue& v);
